poem:
### Vlog Entry

In pixelated drafts of memory,  
a child misplaced by click and share—  
feed spun to gold, then left to glare,  
forsaken in untethered digital seas.

Lenses dial in on our smallest affairs,  
while we sculpt whole lives  
from thumbnails and stares—  
starving the heart to feed the feed.
